wordGroup: familiarize oneself with 使自己熟悉某物

sentences.en: You'll need time to familiarize yourself with our procedures.
sentences.cn: 你需要时间熟悉我们的程序。

sentences.en: Under such circumstances, they will try everything possible to familiarize themselves with the market conditions.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下，他们会尽一切可能去熟悉市场情况。

sentences.en: I'd only be going to familiarize myself with the process, you know, check it out, I was wondering if there is anything you would recommend that I do to prepare.
sentences.cn: 我只是想让自己熟悉一下这个过程，你知道的，我想知道你有没有什么建议我准备的。
